value_i18n.ar_SA: The Liferay Innovation Partner of the Year award recognizes partners who exhibit true innovation in how they go to market. The nature of innovation is limitless!

value_i18n.ar_SA: Winners of this award may have developed new business model concepts that created higher levels of growth and profitability, implemented successful strategies of going to market with 3rd parties, used inventive methods that delivered increased revenue and use of Liferay products and services. This can even include hyper-transformative innovation that redefined or disrupted markets or solved major socio-economic issues.

value_i18n.ar_SA:
Submission Guidelines

  • To be considered, Innovation Partner of the Year nominations must demonstrate
    • How they have created significant impact in the market through net new logos, key wins, high incremental annual recurring revenue growth, new partnerships, etc. 
    • And/or they must demonstrate how they are redefining and disrupting business models, positively impacting humanity, or creating new business models that reach net new customers.
  • Responses must be written in English.
  • Awards cover services and solutions implemented January 1, 2023 through December 1, 2023. 
  • All questions in the application must be complete and include current contact information for the partner contact.
  • To be considered, partners need to be compliant under the Liferay Solution Partner Program Guidelines as outlined in the Program Guide. 
  • We recommend partners use as much content as possible to deliver a comprehensive, complete picture of their relevant customer success. 
  • Winners are determined by a decision committee of Liferay executive and channel director stakeholders.
  • The entry submission deadline is Friday, January 19, 2024 at 11:59 PM PDT. No exceptions. 
  • Please direct any questions to partner-marketing@liferay.com.
